name: AP_CLM_IF_MOE_PX_CCI_TYPE
description: The CCI edit type of procedures received by prospective payment systems (PPS) pricers that use the Medicaid Outpatient Editor (MOE). This table extracts the related multiple response item CLM-22320.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MOE_CCI_EDIT_TYPE
columns.description: The type of coding edits in column one or two for each procedure.
